#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType PositionGPS.

== Name ==

*[CPositionGPS PositionGPS]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--PositionGPS (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			GPS coordinate of a point.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  ([SAngle90 lat] ; [SAngle180 lon] ; [CAltitude alt]) </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CAltitude golfml:Altitude] || [CAltitude alt] ||  Altitude of a GPS position expressed as a float value ||
|| [SAngle90 golfml:Angle90] || [SAngle90 lat] ||  					Latitude of the GPS position expressed as a float value between -90° (South Pole) to +90° (North Pole).				 ||
|| [SAngle180 golfml:Angle180] || [SAngle180 lon] ||  					Longitude in the GPS position expressed as a float value between -180° for longitude West of Greenwich					to +180° for longitude East of Greenwich.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPosition Position]
----
    <xs:complexType name="PositionGPS">  <xs:all>    <xs:element name="lat" type="golfml:Angle90">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="lon" type="golfml:Angle180">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="alt" type="golfml:Altitude">    </xs:element>  </xs:all></xs:complexType>
----
